message: Back when I used to use http://www.thesixtyone.com there was this band that I really liked on there called Fictionist.  They would leave nice comments on my band's music, tweet back and forth with fans, and were just generally internet-fan friendly and nice.
Here are some good songs by them http://listen.grooveshark.com/s/Always/2TpogZ?src=5 http://listen.grooveshark.com/s/Invisible+Hand/2ToX2v?src=5

Anyways, now they're actually seeing some success and are in the running to get on the cover of Rolling Stone magazine and play at Bonnaroo.  It's all vote-based so if you want to check them out/vote for them you can just go here http://www.rollingstone.com/choosethecover/artists/fictionist
